entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C

Humidity: 55 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
